quotes.quote: To me, breakfast is my most important meal. It's often the meal you play a game on. I make sure I have oatmeal, milk, and fruit. It's the fuel you use to hopefully do your best, so eating right is a big part of being a professional athlete. I wish I paid more attention to it earlier in my life.
Breakfast was only worth having when somebody else made it for you.
Breakfast without orange juice is like a day without sunshine.
When you have bacon and eggs for breakfast, the chicken makes a contribution, the pig makes a commitment.
Breakfast cereals that come in the same colors as polyester leisure suits make oversleeping a virtue.
Breakfast is everything. The beginning, the first thing. It is the mouthful that is the commitment to a new day, a continuing life.
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and I definitely have a hearty breakfast before I do anything.
Hope makes a good breakfast. Eat plenty of it.

The little energy you obtained from your breakfast can ignite your willingness to kick start. Don't overlook the little energy you have now by fixing eyes on a supposed magical influence farther away!
Breakfast is a notoriously difficult meal to serve with a flourish.
Don't eat breakfast cereals that change the color of your milk.
One should not attend even the end of the world without a good breakfast.
Breakfast alone by gaslight is about as ghastly as champagne in daylight.
It is more important to eat some carbohydrates at breakfast, because the brain needs fuel right away, and carbohydrate is the best source.
If you look upon ham and eggs and lust, you have already committed breakfast in your heart.
All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.
We had our breakfasts whatever happens in a house, robbery or murder, it doesn't matter, you must have your breakfast.
Breakfast is always the best time for something juicy, sweet and fresh - it just feels like the right way to open the day. There's no right way, though, when it comes to choosing the fruit.
Have a smile for breakfast, you'll be sh—ting joy by lunch.
When you have something for breakfast, you're not going to be starving by lunch.
Everyone's favorite breakfast dish can be prepared in a moment's time with just a few ingredients and minimum effort.
I think its important to start the day with a proper breakfast.
A simple enough pleasure, surely, to have breakfast alone with one's husband, but how seldom married people in the midst of life achieve it.
Not eating breakfast is the worst thing you can do, that's really the take-home message for teenage girls.
Breakfast is the one meal at which it is permissible to read the paper.
Like a breakfast time or lunch time, you must have a thinking time! Without eating and thinking we cannot stick to the existence; without them we cannot stay in the port of this universe!
